name: Handcar Game
description:
Can A.I. make a game? 

Experience the magic of a unique collaboration between human ingenuity and artificial intelligence in "Handcar Game" - a casual mobile game, developed in just a few days using Unity.

Features:

  • Coded by A.I. (GPT-4 LLM)
  • Made by a Human

Credits (Assets used in the game):

Pine tree - Game Dev Skill Up

Stickman - KOMiRA

Bushes -Martin3DWork

Railway track - Odd1In 

Campfire - Gudson7 

Handcar - Free3D 

Joystick Pack - Fenerax Studios

Quick Outline - Chris Nolet

Pixelation - Dmitry Timofeev

Sounds: BFXR and Freesound

Music: Pix - City Over Clouds

IMPORTANT NOTE: Game takes ~less than a minute to complete
